title: 3. IRRI Agronomy Challenge 2: First Fertilizer Application (28 December 2012)

tasks.task: Planting and fertilizer application in rice field
subtasks: Answering questions about crop field for fertilizer recommendation
Using mobile app for precise fertilizer prescription
Calculating fertilizer quantity for the field
Distributing the fertilizer uniformly on the field
Reviewing previous methods and techniques for better application
